action_output:
Reason: "More options" in apps like Contacts typically have additional settings related to the contact, such as enabling notifications or custom ringtones. Accessing this menu might provide an option to enable notifications for the contact. 
Action: {"action_type": "click", "index": 25}
action_reason: "More options" in apps like Contacts typically have additional settings related to the contact, such as enabling notifications or custom ringtones. Accessing this menu might provide an option to enable notifications for the contact.
summary: Action selected: {"action_type": "click", "index": 25}. Clicked "More options" to potentially find notification settings; however, options include "Set ringtone," "Route to voicemail," etc., but no notification settings. Likely need to explore another menu or app feature to enable contact notifications.
